title: Print/invitation, "Invitation, Hanukkah Part"
inscribed: Imprinted on the top 3/4 of the invitation in purple ink: HANUKKAH, HANUKKAH, HANUKKAH. At left margin vertically in black ink: Exhibition; attop center: Gifts; at center: Lecture; at right margin: Children's party. Along the bottom margin in black ink: THE JEWISH MUSEUM, 1109 FIFTH AVENUE,NEW YORK 28, UNDER THE AUSPICES OF THE JEWISH THEOLOGOCAL SEMINARY OF AMERICA.
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff

tombstone.epitaph:
Print/invitation, "Invitation, Hanukkah Part".
Support: yellow wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-73.
